title: Are you the one?
description: Repayment of a debt of gratitude is Stephen's father's explanation when he arm-twists his son to fly to Chennai to meet Bella his betrothed, the daughter of an old friend. Though reluctant at the prospect of an arranged marriage, Stephen is to woo Bella, who seems to be two people - she blows hot, she blows cold and intrigues him enough to make him want to stay on.  Meanwhile, her childhood friend Michael and her sister Mira add spice to the proceedings. Are Bella and Michael in love? Will Stephen be able to win Bella over? Or is his trip to India fated to be a fiasco?
author: Jennifer  Bernard
